level.text: The following civil infractions and their respective fines set forth in this section refer to pedestrians:
Boarding a DC Circulator bus without depositing payment, using a rechargeable fare card, presenting a DC Circulator pass, or displaying a valid pass, transfer, or
Fail to yield to an emergency vehicle (§ 2305.6)
Cross at other than right angle (§ 2304.3)
Soliciting rides while standing in roadway (§ 2305.4)
